CustomBehavior.Text: You meet the level requirement to run this profile.
Sethekk Halls detected, exiting the instance.
Waiting 3 seconds - Bag and durability check.
Waiting 3 seconds - Food check - Clefthoof Ribs.
Our weapon has been Runeforged with Rune of Spellshattering.
Our weapon has not been Runeforged with Rune of Spellshattering.
Distance from portal is not within our proximity, initializing movement to get there.
Our weapon has not been Runeforged with Rune of Spellshattering.
Our weapon has been Runeforged with Rune of Spellshattering.
Waiting for the dungeon to load.
We are instance locked, initiating loop procedures until we enter the instance.
Deleting unwanted items from our bags.
Pulling the first group at the oil lamp.
Pulling the left-hand group at the split.
Pulling the right-hand group at the split.
Waiting 50 second to aggro the patrol.
Pulling the door guards past the split.
Pulling the group with the mushrooms.
Waiting 35 seconds to aggro the patrol.
This isn't easy, give me a break. Waiting 30 seconds to get my shit together.
Pulling the 1st group of three, bridge guards.
This isn't easy, give me a break. Waiting 30 seconds to get my shit together.
This isn't easy, give me a break. Waiting 30 seconds to get my shit together.
Pulling the Sunseeker Botanist on the left.
Pulling the Sunseeker Researcher on the right.
That is as far as we are going for now. We may add more later.
Waiting 3 seconds - Bag and durability check.
Waiting 3 seconds - Food check - Clefthoof Ribs or Mag'har Mild Cheese.
We have more than 25 empty bag slots. Our gear is above 30% durability and we have Clefthoof Ribs.
Exiting the instance so we can reset it.
Our weapon has been Runeforged with Rune of Spellshattering.
Our weapon has not been Runeforged with Rune of Spellshattering.
